outputs.output_descr: This activity will involve an in-depth analysis of the rural development sector and Gender. Two national consultants will be hired to carry out the assignment. the main deliverable will be  a report on the gender analysis in the rural development sector and this will act as a bench mark for the review of the draft IRDS and formulation of a new gender responsive IRDS.

project_descr: The project aims to develop and clarify the policy and institutional framework for planning, coordinating, implementing and monitoring IRD which would in turn facilitate the realization of the overarching goal of IRD in the MGDS II
